Interface ProductServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductService
public interface ProductServiceInterface
ProductServiceInterface ---------------------------- Defines the business operations available for managing products. Responsibilities: - Provides method definitions for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting product data. - Establishes a contract between the controller and service layers.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      List<ProductModel> findAll()
      Retrieves all product records from the database.
      Returns:
      List of ProductModel objects representing all products.

    • findById

      ProductModel findById(int id)
      Retrieves a single product record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The product's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      ProductModel object containing product details.

    • findByRestaurantId

      List<ProductModel> findByRestaurantId(int restaurantId)
      Retrieves all products linked to a specific restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - The restaurant ID to filter products by.
      Returns:
      List of ProductModel objects belonging to that restaurant.

    • create

      boolean create(ProductModel product)
      Creates a new product record in the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The ProductModel object containing product data.
      Returns:
      true if creation succeeded; false otherwise.

    • update

      boolean update(ProductModel product)
      Updates an existing product record in the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The ProductModel object with updated data.
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded; false otherwise.

    • delete

      boolean delete(ProductModel product)
      Deletes a product record from the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The ProductModel object to delete.
      Returns:
      true if deletion succeeded; false otherwise.
